articles.author: HT Sports Desk
articles.title: Gavaskar fumes over 1st T20I wash out:' CSA may not have as much money as BCCI' - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Sunil Gavaskar lashed out at Cricket South Africa (CSA) after the 1st T20I between South Africa and India was washed out by rain in Durban. | Cricket
articles.content: Legendary cricketer Sunil Gavaskar showed no mercy to Cricket South Africa (CSA) after Team India's series opener against the Proteas was called off due to persistent rains in Durban on Sunday. After… [+3598 chars]
